    • Method Detail

      • addCompanionContainer

        public void addCompanionContainer(android.view.ViewGroup container)
        Add a container for showing companion ads. A phone or small tablet might have none or one. Larger devices may have multiple containers for showing companion ads.
        Parameters:
        container - The given container to add to the mix.

      • clearCompanionContainers

        public void clearCompanionContainers()
        Clear all the companion containers.
